page.title: 19Religion
page.content: St Peter's, Pebworth, Church of England dates from l3th century. It shares a vicar with Dorsington and Honeybourne and has a Sunday School. Average weekly congregation is 25 and the collection is Â£30. A rota of women arrange flowers and clean brasses. Money for upkeep is raised by fetes, bazaars and covenants. Long Marston's, St James Parish Church was recently reroofed. A grant, interest free loan and money raised in the parish over l0 years paid for the necessary Â£20,000. Average weekly congregation is l8 and the collection is Â£l0. The vicar shared with Quinton celebrated 30 years in the priesthood in l985. The Methodist Chapel, Long Marston with 7 members was rebuilt in l927.It is served by 4 ministers. Pebworth's Methodist Chapel closed in l979 and is now an art studio.
